hi, 
I am using heritrix-1.14.4.jar and nutchwax-0.13. My problem is that s=
ometimes non-ascii characters are not properly encoded and appear corrupted=
. This happens sometimes only, not always.
For instance, I get "dep=F3sito"=
 from one crawled document, while the reading of another page may produce "=
dep=E3=B3sito".
Any suggestions?

Thank you.
Nacho Gir=E1ldez
